content: I'm going to be on vacation for a week. I won't be reviewing or participating in discussions until the 4th of November where I hope to see many ppl at the Rust meetup in Paris.
@oli does that suggest we should move the dataflow meeting with @ecstatic-morse from Nov 1 to Nov 8 or something?
Nov 8 would be better for me as well
Design meetings are at 7am local time, which is a bit early for me, especially the day after halloween
ps, @oli, if you want I can add you as an "invitee" to the calendar event, but you'll have to tell me which of your bajillion emails you want :)
yea I do realize my email thing isn't the greatest idea
Going on vacation again :skier: I won't be very active next week
I think @nikomatsakis is taking some partial time off this coming week too. But they might just be switching their hours, I cannot remember.
I'll be away monday and friday, and tue-thu I'll be working "morning-shifted hours". I'm expecting to work something like 5am-noon Eastern time.
